meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unsatisfactory.
meanings.sent1: The unsatisfactorinesses of the situation left everyone feeling disappointed.
meanings.sent2: The unsatisfactorinesses of the product led to many customer complaints.
meanings.sent3: The unsatisfactorinesses of the cake made it a complete flop at the party.
meanings.sent4: The unsatisfactorinesses of the weather cast a gloomy shadow over the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The unsatisfactorinesses of the movie plot made it hard to enjoy the film.

meanings.definition: The condition of not meeting expectations or desires.
meanings.sent1: The unsatisfactorinesses of the outcome were evident to all.
meanings.sent2: Her constant unsatisfactorinesses with her job made her consider a career change.
meanings.sent3: The unsatisfactorinesses of the gift exchange left everyone chuckling at the awkwardness.
meanings.sent4: The unsatisfactorinesses of the traffic jam turned the morning commute into a nightmare.
meanings.sent5: The unsatisfactorinesses of the final exam result left the student feeling defeated.
